title: Ottocast elevates the connected car experience with wireless CarPlay AI Box, CloudSIM, Car TV Mate Pro, more [20% off]
description: We’re huge fans of the Ottocast suite of connected car accessories, and 9to5Mac readers can upgrade the car entertainment system while saving 20% for the holidays! From the wireless CarPlay AI box to the newly launched CloudSIM solution, Ottocast has the best solutions for enhancing your trip. more…
author: Sponsored Post
excerpt: We’re huge fans of the Ottocast suite of connected car accessories, and 9to5Mac readers can upgrade the car entertainment system...
text: We’re huge fans of the Ottocast suite of connected car accessories, and 9to5Mac readers can upgrade the car entertainment system while saving 20% for the holidays! From the wireless CarPlay AI box to the newly launched CloudSIM solution, Ottocast has the best solutions for enhancing your trip. Introducing CloudSIM, the best connected car solution The latest innovation from Ottocast is the all-new CloudSIM solution. Priced at $20, the Ottocast CloudSIM provides convenient and affordable data connectivity to the Ottocast suite of car entertainment products. This is great for accessing streaming services without fiddling with hotspots or downloaded content. Just tap and get to watching or listening without using your phone. Voila, you’ve got a connected car just like new cars sold today. CloudSIM brings a smart approach to mobile connectivity, working with every network in your country to keep you connected. The tech automatically picks the strongest signal in your area, so whether you’re grabbing coffee downtown or heading out for a weekend getaway, your car will stay connected without thinking about it. Managing your data is refreshingly simple – just grab what you need right from your phone instead of dealing with carrier stores and paperwork. Plus, CloudSIM’s pricing keeps things budget-friendly, giving you more data without the premium price tag. It’s basically your phone plan minus the usual headaches. Learn more about CloudSIM and get connected today! OttoAibox P3 CarPlay AI Box So what does CloudSIM work with? The OttoAibox P3 CarPlay AI Box is one product that’s perfect for cars with basic wired CarPlay. Not only does the OttoAibox P3 turn wired CarPlay into wireless, but it also adds the awesome Ottodrive 2.0 system to your car’s entertainment system. Meet your car’s new digital brain – a system that brings together all your favorite ways to stay connected on the road. The interface works seamlessly with both CarPlay and Android Auto, while running on Android 12 means you can grab any app you need from the Google Play store. Plus, you’re not just limited to your car’s display – hook it up to your TV, projector, or any HDMI screen to expand your options. The tech under the hood is equally impressive, sporting a robust 8GB RAM and 128GB storage combo that keeps everything running smoothly. Whether you’re navigating with your preferred maps app, streaming music, or sharing your screen with backseat passengers via the headrest monitor, the system handles it all without breaking a stride. And thanks to FOTA updates, your system stays current with automatic downloads, just like your phone. The refreshed interface makes everything easier to find and use, letting you focus on the road ahead while staying connected. Regularly priced at $339.99, the OttoAibox P3 is currently discounted 21% to $269. Save an additional 20% with coupon code TC20 at checkout. Grab your OttoAibox P3 and enhance your ride today! Play2Video Pro Another great solution for upgrading cars with wired CarPlay is the Ottocast Play2Video Pro. This all-in-one adapter converts OEM CarPlay and Android Auto into wireless CarPlay/Android Auto. Regularly priced at $159.99 and discounted 25% to $119.99, this is the most cost-effective method of going wireless. Here’s a rundown of the latest generation of Play2Video Pro features: Convert OEM wired CarPlay into wireless CarPlay/ Android Auto (*Downloading additional apps is not supported*) Built-in up to 5 apps: YouTube, Netflix, IPTV etc. Smoother Android 12 system Support USB multimedia Combine IOS CarPlay and Android Auto wirelessly USB plug and play, no installation required Automatically connect when you get in the car, wireless connection All factory CarPlay features are preserved Free and easy online update The latest Play2Video Pro makes for a great stocking stuffer or treat for yourself. You can even save $10 when you buy two together. Car TV Mate Pro What if you want the full smart TV experience from your car’s display? Enter Car TV Mate Pro. The wireless CarPlay version retails for $95, currently goes for 27% off at $69, and you can save 20% more with code TC20. The Car TV Mate Pro adds an HDMI port to your car so you can plug in TV sticks, gaming devices, and more — all from the basic CarPlay USB port in your car. For example, you can actually plug in a Fire TV Stick and upgrade your basic car display by making it a smart TV screen. Here’s how: Take advantage of these great holiday discounts, and remember to use discount code TC20 at checkout to save 20%! Also don’t forget to upgrade the experience with CloudSIM so your car can turn your Ottocast P3 into an always-online device! Add 9to5Mac to your Google News feed.  FTC: We use income earning auto affiliate links. More.
html:
We’re huge fans of the Ottocast suite of connected car accessories, and 9to5Mac readers can upgrade the car entertainment system while saving 20% for the holidays! From the wireless CarPlay AI box to the newly launched CloudSIM solution, Ottocast has the best solutions for enhancing your trip.

Introducing CloudSIM, the best connected car solution

The latest innovation from Ottocast is the all-new CloudSIM solution.

Priced at $20, the Ottocast CloudSIM provides convenient and affordable data connectivity to the Ottocast suite of car entertainment products.

This is great for accessing streaming services without fiddling with hotspots or downloaded content. Just tap and get to watching or listening without using your phone. Voila, you’ve got a connected car just like new cars sold today.

CloudSIM brings a smart approach to mobile connectivity, working with every network in your country to keep you connected. The tech automatically picks the strongest signal in your area, so whether you’re grabbing coffee downtown or heading out for a weekend getaway, your car will stay connected without thinking about it.

Managing your data is refreshingly simple – just grab what you need right from your phone instead of dealing with carrier stores and paperwork. Plus, CloudSIM’s pricing keeps things budget-friendly, giving you more data without the premium price tag. It’s basically your phone plan minus the usual headaches.

Learn more about CloudSIM and get connected today!

OttoAibox P3 CarPlay AI Box

So what does CloudSIM work with? The OttoAibox P3 CarPlay AI Box is one product that’s perfect for cars with basic wired CarPlay. Not only does the OttoAibox P3 turn wired CarPlay into wireless, but it also adds the awesome Ottodrive 2.0 system to your car’s entertainment system.

Meet your car’s new digital brain – a system that brings together all your favorite ways to stay connected on the road. The interface works seamlessly with both CarPlay and Android Auto, while running on Android 12 means you can grab any app you need from the Google Play store. Plus, you’re not just limited to your car’s display – hook it up to your TV, projector, or any HDMI screen to expand your options.

The tech under the hood is equally impressive, sporting a robust 8GB RAM and 128GB storage combo that keeps everything running smoothly. Whether you’re navigating with your preferred maps app, streaming music, or sharing your screen with backseat passengers via the headrest monitor, the system handles it all without breaking a stride.

And thanks to FOTA updates, your system stays current with automatic downloads, just like your phone. The refreshed interface makes everything easier to find and use, letting you focus on the road ahead while staying connected.

Regularly priced at $339.99, the OttoAibox P3 is currently discounted 21% to $269. Save an additional 20% with coupon code TC20 at checkout. Grab your OttoAibox P3 and enhance your ride today!

Play2Video Pro

Another great solution for upgrading cars with wired CarPlay is the Ottocast Play2Video Pro. This all-in-one adapter converts OEM CarPlay and Android Auto into wireless CarPlay/Android Auto. Regularly priced at $159.99 and discounted 25% to $119.99, this is the most cost-effective method of going wireless.

Here’s a rundown of the latest generation of Play2Video Pro features:

  • Convert OEM wired CarPlay into wireless CarPlay/ Android Auto (*Downloading additional apps is not supported*)
  • Built-in up to 5 apps: YouTube, Netflix, IPTV etc.
  • Smoother Android 12 system
  • Support USB multimedia
  • Combine IOS CarPlay and Android Auto wirelessly
  • USB plug and play, no installation required
  • Automatically connect when you get in the car, wireless connection
  • All factory CarPlay features are preserved
  • Free and easy online update

The latest Play2Video Pro makes for a great stocking stuffer or treat for yourself. You can even save $10 when you buy two together.

Car TV Mate Pro

What if you want the full smart TV experience from your car’s display? Enter Car TV Mate Pro. The wireless CarPlay version retails for $95, currently goes for 27% off at $69, and you can save 20% more with code TC20.

The Car TV Mate Pro adds an HDMI port to your car so you can plug in TV sticks, gaming devices, and more — all from the basic CarPlay USB port in your car.

For example, you can actually plug in a Fire TV Stick and upgrade your basic car display by making it a smart TV screen. Here’s how:

Take advantage of these great holiday discounts, and remember to use discount code TC20 at checkout to save 20%! Also don’t forget to upgrade the experience with CloudSIM so your car can turn your Ottocast P3 into an always-online device!
